alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 1:35PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane affecting Lyon County. Walker River near PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz affecting Mineral County. East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Snowmelt and reservoir releases will cause the river flows to remain high. For the Mainstem Walker River...including PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz, Mason at Snyder Lane...elevated river levels are forecast. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...The river will remain elevated and slightly below flood stage * WHERE...Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Monitor Stage, near bank full conditions. No flooding in the Mason Valley-Yerington area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:05 PM PDT Monday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain fairly level, additional minor future rises are still possible. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.8 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when hiking or camping near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon.
